Secondly , study want determine influence insulin-insensitivity obesity weight reduction treat patient metformin placebo . The subject therefore randomise two double blind group receive either metformin ( 2 x 850 mg per day ) placebo combination moderate energy restriction exercise regimen 30 minute per day 1 year . Treatment effect diet effect metformin weight reduction insulin sensitivity determine treatment period 20 52 week . Insulin sensitivity quantify use homeostasis model assessment ( HOMA ) OGTT . Body composition determine bioelectrical impedance method . Blood also draw hormonal biochemical analysis 20 52 week treatment . Furthermore , patient fill 3-day food diary baseline , 20 week 52 week .
